name: Golden Nugget Lake Tahoe
description: Golden Nugget Lake Tahoe offers luxury rooms with lake and mountain views, 24/7 casino, resort pool, spa, and Saltgrass Steak House. Steps from Edgewood Tahoe Golf Course.
shortDescription: Luxury Stateline casino with lake views, Saltgrass dining, and steps from Edgewood.
highlights: Resort pool with cabanas & fire pits

roomTypes.name: Deluxe Room
roomTypes.description: Comfortable rooms with modern amenities including flat-screen TV, WiFi, coffee maker, and premium bedding.

roomTypes.name: Suite
roomTypes.description: Spacious suite with separate living area, upgraded furnishings, and mountain or lake views.

faqs.question: Where is Golden Nugget Lake Tahoe located?
faqs.answer: On the Nevada side of South Lake Tahoe's casino corridor, within walking distance of Heavenly Village and the gondola to Heavenly ski resort.

faqs.question: Does Golden Nugget have a pool?
faqs.answer: Yes — an outdoor pool is available seasonally along with full casino, dining, and entertainment options.

faqs.question: Can I book golf packages at Golden Nugget?
faqs.answer: Yes — Golf the High Sierra creates custom stay-and-play packages. Call 888-584-8232 for pricing.

meta.title: Golden Nugget Lake Tahoe | Casino & Golf Packages
meta.description: Golden Nugget in Stateline with lake views, Saltgrass dining, and golf packages near Edgewood.

testimonials.quote: Third year in a row staying at Golden Nugget Lake Tahoe for our corporate golf outing. Consistency is what matters for group travel and this property delivers every time. Having GTHS handle reservations saves us hours of coordination.
testimonials.author: Linda F.

testimonials.quote: Booked Golden Nugget Lake Tahoe through Golf the High Sierra for our annual buddies trip. The group rate was excellent and having everything on one contract made logistics so simple. The property itself is well-maintained and staff was great.
testimonials.author: Rebecca O.

testimonials.quote: Golden Nugget Lake Tahoe exceeded our expectations. The staff was incredibly accommodating with our group of 24 — early breakfast, late checkout, bag storage. Everything GTHS promised about this property was accurate.
testimonials.author: Diana R.
